scripts.cypress:run:regressions:test:mobile: npx cypress run -c viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=667,userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 10_3_1 like Mac OS X)" -e baseUrl=https://automationteststore.com/ -s cypress/integration/*.spec.js
